summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Mary E. Erdoes and Jes Staley discussing concerns about a deal related to a DAF (Donor Advised Fund). Epstein expresses frustration with low-level individuals involved in the deal and requests a real proposal. The email contains confidentiality notices and indicates potential attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, expressing his views on a deal and requesting a proposal.

persons.name: Mary E. Erdoes
persons.context: Mary E. Erdoes is one of the recipients of the email, indicating her involvement in the discussed deal.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is another recipient of the email, suggesting he is also involved in the deal.

keyFacts: The email discusses concerns about a DAF deal and the involvement of low-level individuals.
Jeffrey Epstein requests a real proposal regarding the deal.
The email contains confidentiality notices and may be attorney-client privileged.
